cause.description:
This is just a way to get people to support those who suffer from parkinsons or know a loved who does.
1. www.pdf.org
2. Parkinsons will one day be cured.
3. www.michaeljfox.org
cause.mission: spread the word about the seriousness of the disease and provide support for those who suffer or know people who do
cause.name: Parkinsons Disease Foundation
